function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of questionnaires and interviews as research tools can increase the risk of disease transmission in the data collection process","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among the respondents and researchers","Mitigation":"Use of digital data collection methods, personal protective equipment (PPE) for in-person interviews, and adherence to public health guidelines","Technologies":"Digital survey platforms, video conferencing for interviews, and contactless data collection tools","People":"Respondents, researchers, and data collectors","Owner":"Researcher, research institution, and ethics review board"}]}
